title: CT transcode output specification for videos

___preset.description: Preset to use to transcode the file

___keep_ratio.description: Keep the video ratio. If true and ratio change, the transcode will fail.

___no_enlarge.description: If size provided is bigger than original the transcode will fail.

___s3_rrs.description: Activate reduced redundancy or not in S3 storage

___output_type.description: Type of the file to output

___audio_bitrate.description: Override default preset bitrate for audio. In Kbits/s.

___audio_codec.description: Override the audio codec used by preset

___output_file.description: Filename where to upload the resulting file

___x.description: Change the watermark position. In pixels

___y.description: Change the watermark position. In pixels

___input_bucket.description: Bucket name and path where the watermark is located

___input_file.description: Filename of the file containing the watermark

___size.description: Size of the watermark in the video result ([width]x[height])

___video_bitrate.description: Override default preset bitrate for video. In Kbits/s.

___output_bucket.description: S3 bucket and path where the output file will be uploaded

___video_codec.description: Override the video codec used by codec
